answers.answer: That is an impossible question to answer on this board. I suggest you purchase one of the very excellent books "Diabetes for Dummies" available at Amazon or your local bookstore, or go to youtube.com and listen to some of the excellent explanatory videos. Kahn medical has a superb series of free videos on youtube.com on the nature of and treatment of diabetes.

question: I want to know more in detail about diabetics, its causes and signes for precautions.
title: What is diabetics?
